description.p: RiverDeck is an application for using stream controller devices like the Elgato Stream Deck.
RiverDeck is forked from OpenDeck and supports the majority of the original Stream Deck plugins, unlike other third-party options which are often more limited.
Please note that you may need to install udev subsystem rules for your device to be detected. For more information, see the Installation section of the project README on GitHub.
Many plugins are not compiled for Linux, so you may need to have Wine (and Wine Mono) installed on your system (natively, as the Wine Flatpak is not supported).
